oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Partitions of the set of natural numbers and symplectic homology
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Uljarevic, Igor
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Symplectic Geometry
Mathematics - Combinatorics
Mathematics - Number Theory
53D40, 05A18, 11B75
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We prove Tamura's theorem on partitions of the set of positive integers (a generalization of the more famous Rayleigh-Beatty theorem) using the positive $\mathbb{S}^1$-equivariant symplectic homology.
